itmo.labs.zavar.commands.base

Class Environment.History

  • java.lang.Object
    • itmo.labs.zavar.commands.base.Environment.History
  • Enclosing class:
    Environment

    public class Environment.History
extends Object
    Class uses to contain global history of commands and to contain temp history of "execute_script" command to prevent recursion.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Zavar
